DOC.brief_summary: Study 0038 compares the safety and effectiveness of an investigational drug, TD-5108 with placebo (a sugar pill) for the treatment of chronic constipation.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of a 5-HT4 Agonist in Chronic Constipation (ACCORD Trial)
DOC.criteria: Meet ROME III Criteria Constipation caused by:colonic etiology, pelvic floor dysfunction, metabolic disturbances, neurologic disturbances,concomitant medications affecting bowel function Chronic treatment with anticholinergics, narcotic analgesics Irritable Bowel Syndrome
